title: Mine and Mines
description: Love, betrayal, and danger. Majesty Morgan, an attractive woman of a certain age, finds herself suddenly rich and looking for a new home in Colorado, but ends up finding more than she bargained for. She's a lady who knows what she wants, or does she? Will the handsome attorney, Daniel Bowman, help her discover what she has been longing for, or will that task go to successful rancher and international businessman, Jake Scott? Majesty thinks she has found what she came to Colorado in search of, until errant gunfire, a murder, and a nefarious scheme that causes federal agents to get involved nearly derails her life and her new-found love.
author: T.J.  Lee
